Name: Temple Raid VR
About the game: Temple Raid VR is a classic exploration game developed specifically for VR. The call of a timeless guardian draws you into an ancient temple, where you can discover a great treasure that has been undisturbed for eons! Navigate the perils of the temple using VR motion controllers. Climb around and explore inside this mysterious world, and solve the puzzles that guard the treasure. Think Tomb Raider: climb and problem-solve your way through the temple in VR in order to reveal the treasure that lies within. While the premise seems simple enough, the treasure has been sitting there for 10,000 years, and it won't be an easy feat to acquire it. An ominous guardian with an ancient, raspy voice protects this temple. The guardian isn't too keen to see you. Realistic climbing along treacherous cliffs and fling yourself across ravines! Single Player Campaign split into manageable scenes and bite-sized checkpoints Collect Gems and Idols are strewn around this forgotten ruin Built exclusively to take advantage of VR and motion controllers
